indicators.name: Digital health prioritized at the national level through dedicated bodies / mechanisms for governance
indicators.indicatorDescription: Does the country have a separate department / agency / national working group for digital health?
indicators.scoreDescription: Nascent governance structure for digital health is constituted on a case-by-case basis

indicators.name: Digital Health prioritized at the national level through planning
indicators.indicatorDescription: Is digital health included and budgeted for in national health or relevant national strategies and/or plan(s)?
indicators.scoreDescription: Digital health is being implemented in an ad hoc fashion in health programs with some discussion of inclusion in national health or other relevant national strategies or plans

indicators.name: Digital health prioritized at the national level through dedicated bodies / mechanisms for governance
indicators.indicatorDescription: Does the country have a separate department / agency / national working group for digital health?
indicators.scoreDescription: Nascent governance structure for digital health is constituted on a case-by-case basis
